name: CategoryTheory.Groupoid.isIsomorphic_iff_nonempty_hom
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Groupoid C
X Y : C
⊢ Iff (CategoryTheory.IsIsomorphic X Y) (Nonempty (Quiver.Hom X Y))
decl:
theorem Groupoid.isIsomorphic_iff_nonempty_hom {C : Type u} [Groupoid.{v} C] {X Y : C} :
    IsIsomorphic X Y ↔ Nonempty (X ⟶ Y) :=
  (Groupoid.isoEquivHom X Y).nonempty_congr
